question:
Which among the following comparisons of the Competition Commission of India (CCI) and Competition Appellate Tribunal (CAT) is / are correct?
1. While CCI does not adjudicate on disputes, CAT adjudicates on disputes
2. Chairperson of the CCI must be an IAS officer, while chairman of CAT must be qualified to be a judge of a High Court
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
